name: Mono-Linyah
indications: mono-linyah combination norgestimate , progestin , ethinyl estradiol , estrogen , indicated females reproductive potential prevent pregnancy . ( 1.1 )
contraindications: take one tablet daily mouth time every day ( 2.1 ) take tablets order directed blister pack ( 2.1 ) skip delay tablet intake . ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions: mono-linyah tablets available compact blister card ( ndc 16714-360-01 ) containing 28 tablets following order : 21 blue , biconvex , round , coated tablets `` c3 `` debossed one side containing 0.250 mg norgestimate 0.035 mg ethinyl estradiol , 7 white , biconvex , round , coated tablets `` p `` debossed one side `` n `` debossed side containing inert ingredients . mono-linyah tablets available following configurations : carton 1 blister card ndc 16714-360-02 carton 3 blister cards ndc 16714-360-03 carton 6 blister cards ndc 16714-360-04
adverseReactions: high risk arterial venous thrombotic diseases ( 4 ) liver tumors liver disease ( 4 ) undiagnosed abnormal uterine bleeding ( 4 ) breast cancer ( 4 ) co-administration hepatitis c combinations containing ombitasvir/paritaprevir/ritonavir , without dasabuvir ( 4 )
indications_original: Mono-Linyah isÂ a combination of norgestimate, a progestin, and ethinyl estradiol, an estrogen, indicated for use by females of reproductive potential to prevent pregnancy. ( 1.1 )
contraindications_original: Take one tablet daily by mouth at the same time every day (2.1) Take tablets in the order directed on the blister pack (2.1) Do not skip or delay tablet intake. (2.1)
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Mono-Linyah Tablets are available in a compact blister card (NDC 16714-360-01) containing 28 tablets in the following order: 21 blue, biconvex, round, coated tablets with "C3" debossed on one side containing 0.250 mg norgestimate and 0.035 mg ethinyl estradiol, and 7 white, biconvex, round, coated tablets with "P" debossed on one side and the "N" debossed on the other side containing inert ingredients.
                        Mono-Linyah Tablets are available in the following configurations:
                        Carton of 1 blister card NDC 16714-360-02
                        Carton of 3 blister cards NDC 16714-360-03
                        Carton of 6 blister cards NDC 16714-360-04
adverseReactions_original: A high risk of arterial or venous thrombotic diseases (4) Liver tumors or liver disease (4) Undiagnosed abnormal uterine bleeding (4) Breast cancer (4) Co-administration with Hepatitis C drug combinations containing ombitasvir/paritaprevir/ritonavir, with or without dasabuvir ( 4 )
